note: Regenerative farmer on a small island in Canada; marketing, graphic design and social media too. Part time worker in a literacy nonprofit and national art prize. Dreams of writing essays.

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: Queer, trans and progressive. Time to transform capitalism.

fields.name: Work history
fields.value: All things printing, graphic design, procurement, marketing, writing, social media. Wish I could write more but too busy regenerating my family's farm  and creating a social minded business.

fields.name: Why I'm here
fields.value: I'm burnt out on social media. Looking for some refreshing connection with people.
